roleset.name: no longer be there
roleset.note: DISAPPEAR-V NOTES: Member of VNcls disappearance-48.2. (from disappear.01-v)

example.name: normal usaged
example.text: ``If there's a problem, Peter disappears, and all of a sudden Jon shows up.''

example.name: specialized usage
example.text: John learned in history class about how the government of Argentina "disappeared" many of its own citizens, often subjecting them to torture.
